<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Cloud Types</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/cloud/type"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns the list of cloud account types supported by Prisma Cloud. You can also filter the cloud account types that you have onboarded.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"onlyAccessible","in":"query","description":"**true** = return only cloud types to which the user has access and for which he has onboarded cloud accounts. Default is **false**.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"includeOthers","in":"query","description":"returns other cloudType in response if includeOthers is true","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json; charset=UTF-8"} value={"application/json; charset=UTF-8"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>
